name: One Minute DEMO
description:
This is a super duper short preview of a game I am working on. Maybe a 5 second experience.

NONE of the main features have been added yet so it is kind of just a walking simulation. No enemies, nothing. No timer as well.

The main premise is that you have 60 seconds, or "One Minute", to beat the level, whist dodging things such as lava pits and enemies (enemies still in progress, as I said).

I'm still working on resolutions so it has the main Unity resolution currently.

I wanted this to be more of a speedrunning game, for people to speedrun, but since this is my first game, I am not sure if it is THAT.

Enjoy!
